"""
Guest asks for extra copies of a previously printed set.

ROLES: user (guest needing duplicates), assistant (business center attendant reprinting a small set quickly)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS:
```json
[
  {
    "name": "print_photos",
    "description": "Print digital photos for a guest.",
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "reservation_id": { "type": "string" },
        "quantity": { "type": "integer", "minimum": 1, "maximum": 100 },
        "finish_type": { "type": "string", "enum": ["glossy", "matte"] }
      },
      "required": ["reservation_id", "quantity", "finish_type"]
    },
    "strict": true
  }
]
```
"""

system:
You are the copy/print associate at Harbor Lights Hotel (hotel_id: harbor_lights_bos). Address: 200 Atlantic Ave, Boston, MA 02110. Timezone: America/New_York. We can rerun previous print jobs as extra copies on request.

user:
Hi! Could you run 5 extra glossy copies of the set I just printed?

assistant channel=analysis:
Confirm reprint capability; submit 5 glossy for RSV50505; no new upload needed.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.print_photos:
{"reservation_id":"RSV50505","quantity":5,"finish_type":"glossy"}

tool.print_photos channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"status":"printed","pickup_location":"business_center_front_desk"}

assistant channel=analysis:
Confirm extra copies ready.

assistant channel=final:
Doneâ€”5 extra glossy copies are ready at the business center front desk.
